### Contact Us

1. **Winnsboro City Hall**  
   501 S Main Street  
   Winnsboro, TX

   Phone: [903-342-3654](tel:903-342-3654)  
   Fax: 903-342-5708

   Monday through Thursday 8:00am - 4:30pm  
   Friday 8:00am - 12:00pm
